            def reorder_sections
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
              old_order = @path.sections.map { |s| [s.id, s.position] }
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
              new_order = params[:sections][:positions].map { |id, position| [id.to_i, position.to_i] }
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
              revised_order = reorder(old_order, new_order)
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
              revised_order.each do |s|
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
                @path.sections.find(s[0]).update_attribute(:position, s[1])
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
              end
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
              redirect_to edit_path_path(@path, :m => "sections")
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
            end

          	def preview
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          7
          
              begin
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          7
          
                logger.debug 
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          7
          
                read_file(params[:path][:file])
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          6
          
                @collected_answers = params[:collected_answers]
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          6
          
                @tab_delimited = params[:tab_delimited]
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          6
          
                @path_description = get_path_description
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          6
          
                @sections = []
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          6
          
                details = get_section(@sections.size + 1)
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          6
          
                until details.nil? || !flash[:error].nil?
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          24
          
                  s = @path.sections.build(details)
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          24
          
                  if s.valid?
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          24
          
                    tasks = get_section_tasks(@sections.size + 1)
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          24
          
                    unless tasks.nil?
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          24
          
                      valid_tasks = []
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          24
          
                      tasks.each do |task|
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          48
          
                        t = s.tasks.build(task)
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          48
          
                        valid_tasks << t
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          
          
                        #There will alway be one error for section blank
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          48
          
                        flash[:error] =  t.errors.full_messages.join(". ") if t.errors.count > 1
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
                      end
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          24
          
                      if flash[:error].nil?
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          24
          
                        @sections << [s, valid_tasks]
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          24
          
                        details = get_section(@sections.size + 1)
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
                      end
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          
          
                    else
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          
          
                      flash[:error] = "There were no tasks found for section: " + s.name
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
                      break
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          
          
                    end
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
                  else
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
                    flash[:error] = s.errors.full_messages.join(". ")
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          
          
                  end
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          
          
                end
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
              rescue
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          1
          
               flash[:error] = "An error occurred while processing your file. Please check your file for any errors and try to upload it again."
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          1
          
               logger.debug $!.to_s
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          1
          
               redirect_to file_path_path(@path)
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
              end
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
          	end
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          
          
            
        
      180.

            def upload
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          2
          
              begin
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          2

      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          2

      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          2

      185. 
      
        
    185.

      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          
          
                  s[:tasks].each { |id, t| section.tasks.create!(t) }
        
      187. 
      
        
    187.

      188. 
      
        
    188.

    189.

          	def create

            def reorder_tasks
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
              old_order = @section.tasks.map { |t| [t.id, t.position] }
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
              new_order = params[:tasks][:positions].map { |id, position| [id.to_i, position.to_i] }
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
              revised_order = reorder(old_order, new_order)
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
              revised_order.each do |t|
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
                @section.tasks.find(t[0]).update_attribute(:position, t[1])
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
              end
        
      101. 
      
        
    101.

            def research
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
              @mode = params[:m]
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
              if params[:m] == "clear"

    115. 
          
          
                if @section.update_attribute("instructions", nil)

    116.

      117. 
      
        
    117.

    118.

      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
                end
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
                redirect_to edit_section_path(@section, :m => "instructions")
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
              elsif params[:m] == "create"
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
                @topics = params[:topics].split(",")
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
                if params[:main_topic]
        
      124.

                  @topics << @section.name
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
                end
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
                @topics = @topics.map {|t| t.strip}
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
                @quoted_topics = @topics.map {|t| '"'+t+'"'}
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
                
        
      129. 
      
        
    129.

      132. 
      
        
    132.

      133. 
      
        
    133.

      134. 
      
        
    134.

      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
                  @answers << t.describe_correct_answer
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
                end
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
                @answers = @answers.uniq.join(", ")
        
      138. 
      
        
    138.

      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
              else

      144.

          1
          
            def questions
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
              @title = "Generate Questions"
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
              @url = "http://ec2-50-19-152-110.compute-1.amazonaws.com:3000/generate"
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
              @limit = params[:limit]
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
              text = clean_text(@section.instructions)
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
              
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
              paragraphs = text.split("<p>")
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
              @split_paragraphs = []
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
              paragraphs.each do |p|
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
                split_paragraph = p.split(". ")
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
                sentences = []
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
                split_paragraph.each_index do |si|
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
                  sentence = split_paragraph[si].chomp + "."
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          
          
                  if sentence.length > 35 
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          
          
                    sentences << sentence
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
                  end
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
                  if sentence.length > 160 || sentences.length >= 3
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
                    @split_paragraphs << sentences.join(" ")
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
                    sentences = []
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
                  end
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          
          
                end
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          
          
                unless sentences.empty?
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
                  @split_paragraphs << sentences.join(" ")
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          
          
                end
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
              end
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
              @quoted_paragraphs = @split_paragraphs.map {|t| '"'+t+'"'}
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          
          
            end
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          
          
            
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          1
          
            def generate
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
              @text = params[:text]
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          
          
              uri = URI.parse("http://ec2-50-19-152-110.compute-1.amazonaws.com:3000/generate")
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          
          
              http = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port)
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
          
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
              http.read_timeout = 90
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          
          
              request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(uri.request_uri)
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          
          
              request.set_form_data({'text' => @text})
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          
          
              resp, @data = http.request(request)
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          
          
              
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          
          
              unless @data.nil?
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          
          
                logger.debug @data
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          
          
                respond_to do |format|
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          
          
                  format.json
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          
          
                end
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          
          
              end
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          
          
            end
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          
          
            
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          1
          
            def review
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          
          
              @title = "Review Questions"
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          
          
              raw_questions = params[:questions]
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          
          
              @processed_questions = {}
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          
          
              raw_questions.each do |key, value|
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
                value = value.split("?")
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          
          
                question = value[0].to_s + "?"
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          
          
                answer = value[1].to_s
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          
          
                @processed_questions[key] = {:question => question, :answer1 => answer}
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          
          
              end
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          
          
              logger.debug "PQ:"
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          
          
              logger.debug @processed_questions.to_s
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          
          
            end
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          
          
            
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          1
          
            def bulk_tasks
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          
          
              raw_questions = params[:questions]
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          
          
              @processed_questions = {}
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          
          
              raw_questions.each do |key, values|
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          
          
                new_task = @section.tasks.build(values.merge(:points => 10))
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          
          
                unless new_task.save
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          
          
                  @processed_questions[key] = values.merge(:errors => new_task.errors.full_messages)
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          
          
                end
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          
          
              end
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          
          
              if @processed_questions.size > 0
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          
          
                flash[:error] = "Could not save the following tasks. Please review and resubmit."
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          
          
                render "review"
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          
          
              else
        
      218. 
      
        
    218. 
          
          
                flash[:success] = "All tasks successfully added!"
        
      219. 
      
        
    219. 
          
          
                redirect_to edit_section_path(@section, :m => "tasks")
        
      220. 
      
        
    220. 
          
          
              end
        
      221. 
      
        
    221. 
          
          
            end
        
      222. 
      
        
    222. 
          
          
          
        
      223. 
      
        
    223. 
          
          
          # Begin Section Journey
        
      224. 
      
        
    224. 
          
          
            
        
      225. 
      
        
    225. 
          1
          
            def continue
        
      226. 
      
        
    226. 
          17
          
              @task = @section.next_task(current_user)
        
      227. 
      
        
    227. 
          17
          
              if @task.nil?
        
      228. 
      
        
    228. 
          4
          
                last_task = current_user.completed_tasks.includes(:section).where(["sections.id = ?", @section.id]).first(:order => "completed_tasks.id DESC")
        
      229. 
      
        
    229. 
          4
          
                @answers = current_user.completed_tasks.joins(:task).where(["section_id = ?", last_task.task.section_id]).all
        
      230. 
      
        
    230. 
          4
          
                if !@answers.empty?
        
      231. 
      
        
    231. 
          4
          
                  @total_answers = @answers.size
        
      232. 
      
        
    232. 
          4
          
                  @correct_answers = 0
        
      233. 
      
        
    233. 
          19
          
                  @answers.each {|a| @correct_answers += a.status_id}
        
      234. 
      
        
    234. 
          
          
                end
        
      235. 
      
        
    235. 
          4
          
                @final_section = true if @path.next_section(@section).nil?
        
      236. 
      
        
    236. 
          4
          
                render "results"
        
      237. 
      
        
    237. 
          
          
              else
        
      238. 
      
        
    238. 
          13
          
                if params[:previous]
        
      239. 
      
        
    239. 
          4
          
                  @correct = (params[:previous] == "1" ? true : false)
        
      240. 
      
        
    240. 
          
          
                end
        
      241. 
      
        
    241. 
          13
          
                @progress = @path.percent_complete(current_user) + 1
        
      242. 
      
        
    242. 
          13
          
                @earned_points = @path.enrollments.where(["user_id = ?", current_user.id]).first.total_points
        
      243. 
      
        
    243. 
          13
          
                @possible_points = 10
        
      244. 
      
        
    244. 
          13
          
                @streak_points = @section.user_streak(current_user)
        
      245. 
      
        
    245. 
          
          
                
        
      246. 
      
        
    246. 
          13
          
                @info_resource = @task.info_resource
        
      247. 
      
        
    247. 
          13
          
                @title = @section.name
        
      248. 
      
        
    248. 
          13
          
                unless params[:comments_on].nil?
        
      249. 
      
        
    249. 
          
          
                  @comments_on = true
        
      250. 
      
        
    250. 
          
          
                  @comments = @task.comments.all
        
      251. 
      
        
    251. 
          
          
                  @comment = @task.comments.new
        
      252. 
      
        
    252. 
          
          
                end
        
      253. 
      
        
    253. 
          
          
              end
        
      254. 
      
        
    254. 
          
          
          	end
        
      255.

            private
        
      257.

              def verify_enrollment
        
      258. 
      
        
    258. 
          17
          
                if @section.nil?
        
      259. 
      
        
    259. 
          17
          
                  get_section_from_id
        
      260. 
      
        
    260. 
          
          
                end
        
      261. 
      
        
    261. 
          17
          
                @path = @section.path
        
      262. 
      
        
    262. 
          17
          
                unless current_user.enrolled?(@path)
        
      263. 
      
        
    263. 
          
          
                  flash[:warning] = "You must be enrolled in a path before you can begin."
        
      264. 
      
        
    264. 
          
          
                  redirect_to root_path
        
      265. 
      
        
    265. 
          
          
                end
        
      266. 
      
        
    266. 
          
          
              end
        
      267.

          1
          
              def get_section_from_id
        
      269. 
      
        
    269. 
          46
          
                @section = Section.find(params[:id], :include => :path)
        
      270. 
      
        
    270. 
          
          
              end
        
      271. 
      
        
    271. 
          
          
              
        
      272. 
      
        
    272. 
          1
          
              def clean_text(text)
        
      273. 
      
        
    273. 
          
          
                text = text.gsub("This section will include questions on the following topics", "")
        
      274. 
      
        
    274. 
          
          
                  .gsub("<b>","  ")
        
      275. 
      
        
    275. 
          
          
                  .gsub("</b>","  ")
        
      276. 
      
        
    276. 
          
          
                  .gsub("<sub>","")
        
      277. 
      
        
    277. 
          
          
                  .gsub("</sub>","  ")
        
      278. 
      
        
    278. 
          
          
                  .gsub(/<a[^>]*>/im,"  ")
        
      279. 
      
        
    279. 
          
          
                  .gsub(/<\/a>/im,"  ")
        
      280. 
      
        
    280. 
          
          
                  .gsub(/<li\b[^>]*>(.*?)<\/li>/im," ")
        
      281. 
      
        
    281. 
          
          
                  .gsub(/<!--[^>]*-->/im,"")
        
      282. 
      
        
    282. 
          
          
                  .gsub(/<[\/a-z123456]{2}[^>]*>/im," ")
        
      283. 
      
        
    283. 
          
          
                  .gsub(/<[\/bi][^>]*>/im," ")
        
      284. 
      
        
    284. 
          
          
                  .gsub(/\[[^\]]+\]/im," ")
        
      285. 
      
        
    285. 
          
          
                  .gsub(/\([^\)]+\)/im," ")
        
      286. 
      
        
    286. 
          
          
                  .gsub("&nbsp;"," ")
        
      287. 
      
        
    287. 
          
          
                  .gsub("&quot;","")
        
      288. 
      
        
    288. 
          
          
                  .gsub(/\r\n/," ")
        
      289. 
      
        
    289. 
          
          
                  .gsub(/"/,"'")
        
      290. 
      
        
    290. 
          
          
                until text.gsub!(/\s\s/,"").nil?
        
      291. 
      
        
    291. 
          
          
                  text = text.gsub(/\s\s/, " ")
        
      292. 
      
        
    292. 
          
          
                end
        
      293. 
      
        
    293. 
          
          
                text = text.gsub(" .", ".").gsub(" ,", ",")
        
      294. 
      
        
    294. 
          
          
                return text.strip.chomp
        
      295. 
      
        
    295. 
          
          
              end
        
      296. 
      
        
    296. 
          
          
          end
        
      297.

      15.

          			A little info about the demo - all the content on this account is randomly generated to give an idea of what a living Moonlite account might look like. Because new features are moving and changing so fast we haven't really invested just yet in static content for Paths other than on our local machines.
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
          			Also, please feel free to take the tour (link at the top right), though you may notice that it is often slightly out of date, as we only update it after new features are live. Hope you enjoy!"

            def suggest

    60.

      61.

              @associated_phrases = []

              unless phrase.nil?
        
      64.

                @associated_phrases = phrase.associated_phrases
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
              end

          	def admin_tour
        
      13.

            def find_changes(old, new)
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
              changes = []
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
              old.each_index do |i|
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
                old_el = old[i]
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
                new_el = new[i]
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
                changes << [old_el[0],new_el[1]] unless old[i] == new[i]
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
              end
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
              return changes
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
            end
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
          
        
      14.

      20. 
      
        
    20.

            def change_position_by_id(id, desired_position, ary)
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
              index = get_index_of_id(id, ary)
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
              ary[index][1] = desired_position
        
      41.

            def move_everything_up_between(lower, upper, ary)

            def sort_by_position(ary)
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
              return ary.sort { |a, b| a[1] <=> b[1] }
        
      96.

      97.

            def reorder(old, new)
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
              changes = find_changes(old, new)
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
              results = Array.new(old)
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
              changes.each do |c|
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
                id = c[0]
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
                desired_position = c[1]
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
                current_position = get_position_of_id(id, results)
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
                if going_up?(current_position,desired_position)
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
                  results = move_everything_down_between(desired_position,current_position,results)
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
                else
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
                  results = move_everything_up_between(desired_position,current_position,results)
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
                end
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
                results = change_position_by_id(id, desired_position, results)
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
                results = sort_by_position(results)
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
              end
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
              return results
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
            end
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
          end
        
      122.

            def create_task(row)
        
      94.

          48

          1
          
            def insert_wrong_answers(tasks)
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
              answer_collection = []
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
              tasks.each do |t|
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
                unless is_predictable?(t[:answer1])
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
                  answer_collection.push(t[:answer1])
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
                end
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
              end
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
              answer_collection = answer_collection.uniq
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
              answer_collection_size = answer_collection.size - 1
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
              tasks.each do |t|
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
              
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
                correct_answer = t[:answer1]
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
                answers = []
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
                answers << t[:answer2] if t[:answer2]
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
                answers << t[:answer3] if t[:answer3]
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
                answers << t[:answer4] if t[:answer4]
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
                
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
                unless answers.size > 0
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
                  correct_answer_index = answer_collection.index(correct_answer)
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
                  predictable_type = is_predictable?(correct_answer)
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
                  if predictable_type
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
                    answers = predict_answers(correct_answer, predictable_type)
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
                  else
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
                    logger.debug correct_answer_index
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
                    logger.debug answer_collection_size
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
                    random_order = random_set(3, answer_collection_size, [correct_answer_index])
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
                    answers << t[:answer1]
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
                    answers << answer_collection[random_order[0]]
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
                    answers << answer_collection[random_order[1]] if random_order[1]
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
                    answers << answer_collection[random_order[2]] if random_order[2]
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
                  end
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
                else
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
                  answers << t[:answer1]
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
                end
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
                
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
                answers = answers.shuffle
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
                unless predictable_type == "bool"
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
                  answer_index = answers.index(correct_answer)
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
                  raise "Can't find correct answer in list of answers. Answer: "+correct_answer+"; Answers: "+answers.to_s if answer_index.nil?
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
                  correct_answer = answer_index + 1
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
                else
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
                  correct_answer = answers.index("true")
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
                  correct_answer = answers.index("false") if correct_answer.nil?
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
                  correct_answer += 1
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
                end
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          
          
                t[:answer1] = answers[0]
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          
          
                t[:answer2] = answers[1]
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
                t[:answer3] = answers[2] if answers[2]
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
                t[:answer4] = answers[3] if answers[3]
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
                t[:correct_answer] = correct_answer
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
              end
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
              return tasks
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          
          
            end
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          
          
            
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          1
          
            def is_predictable?(answer)
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          
          
              answer = answer.downcase
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
              begin
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
                Integer(answer)
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          
          
                return "int"
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          
          
              rescue ArgumentError
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
                logger.debug "NOT INT"
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
              end
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          
          
              
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          
          
              return (answer == "false" || answer == "true" ? "bool" : false)
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
            end
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
          
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          1
          
            def predict_answers(answer, type = nil)
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          
          
              logger.debug "PREDICTING"
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          
          
              type = is_predictable?(answer) if type == nil
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          
          
              answers = []
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          
          
              if type == "int"
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          
          
                answers = random_range_series(answer, 4)
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          
          
                answers = answers.map! {|a| a.to_s}
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          
          
              elsif type == "bool"
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          
          
                answer = answer.downcase
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          
          
                answers << answer
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          
          
                answers << (answer == "false" ? "true" : "false")
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          
          
              else
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          
          
                logger.debug "FUCK: Invalid predictable type."
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          
          
              end
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          
          
              return answers
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          
          
            end
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          
          
          
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          1
          
            def random_range_series(num, length)
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          
          
              num = Integer(num)
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          
          
              if num < 10
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          
          
                max_diff = 4
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          
          
              elsif num < 100
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          
          
                max_diff = 30
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          
          
              else
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          
          
                max_diff = num / 50
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          
          
              end
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          
          
              new_nums = Set.new
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          
          
              new_nums << num
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          
          
              loop_counter = 0
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          
          
              loop do
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          
          
                loop_counter += 1
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          
          
                if loop_counter >= 1000
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          
          
                  raise "Possible infinite loop in random range series"
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          
          
                end
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          
          
                diff = rand(max_diff)
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          
          
                new_num = (rand(2) == 1 ? (num + diff) : (num - diff))
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          
          
                if num < 2012 
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          
          
                  if new_num >= 0 && new_num <= 2012
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          
          
                    new_nums << new_num
        
      218. 
      
        
    218. 
          
          
                  end
        
      219. 
      
        
    219. 
          
          
                else
        
      220. 
      
        
    220. 
          
          
                  new_nums << new_num
        
      221. 
      
        
    221. 
          
          
                end 
        
      222. 
      
        
    222. 
          
          
                return new_nums.to_a if new_nums.length >= length
        
      223. 
      
        
    223. 
          
          
              end
        
      224. 
      
        
    224. 
          
          
            end
        
      225. 
      
        
    225. 
          
          
            
        
      226. 
      
        
    226. 
          1
          
            def random_set(length, max, excluded_nums = [])
        
      227. 
      
        
    227. 
          
          
              if max <= length
        
      228. 
      
        
    228. 
          
          
                length = max - 1
        
      229. 
      
        
    229. 
          
          
              end
        
      230. 
      
        
    230. 
          
          
              randoms = Set.new
        
      231. 
      
        
    231. 
          
          
              loop_counter = 0
        
      232. 
      
        
    232. 
          
          
              loop do
        
      233. 
      
        
    233. 
          
          
                loop_counter += 1
        
      234. 
      
        
    234. 
          
          
                if loop_counter >= 1000
        
      235. 
      
        
    235. 
          
          
                  raise "Possible infinite loop in random set"
        
      236. 
      
        
    236. 
          
          
                end
        
      237. 
      
        
    237. 
          
          
                n = rand(max)
        
      238. 
      
        
    238. 
          
          
                unless excluded_nums.include?(n)
        
      239. 
      
        
    239. 
          
          
                  randoms << n
        
      240. 
      
        
    240. 
          
          
                end
        
      241. 
      
        
    241. 
          
          
                return randoms.to_a if randoms.length >= length
        
      242. 
      
        
    242. 
          
          
              end
        
      243. 
      
        
    243. 
          
          
            end
        
      244. 
      
        
    244. 
          
          
          end
        
      245.

          # Set up gems listed in the Gemfile.
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          1

      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
          begin
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          1
          
            ENV['BUNDLE_GEMFILE'] = gemfile
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          1
          
            require 'bundler'
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          1
          
            Bundler.setup
        
      9. 
      
        
    9.

      10. 
      
        
    10.

      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
            STDERR.puts "Try running `bundle install`."
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
            exit!
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          1
          
          end if File.exist?(gemfile)

          	# test suite.  You never need to work with it otherwise.  Remember that

    spec/controllers/completed_tasks_controller_spec.rb

    100.0 % covered

    97 relevant lines. 97 lines covered and 0 lines missed.

          require 'spec_helper'

          	describe "POST 'create'" do
        
      18.

          1
          
          		before(:each) do
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          11
          
          			@password = "current_password"
        
      20.

    spec/controllers/leaderboards_controller_spec.rb

            describe "access controller" do

    18. 
          1

    20. 
          1

          			:user_id => @user.id

          		}

      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          1
          
          			describe "failure" do
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          1
          
          				describe "with empty values" do
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          1
          
          					before(:each) do
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          3
          
          						@attr = @attr.merge(:name => "", :description => "")
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
          					end
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
          				
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          1
          
          					it "should not create a path" do
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          1
          
          						lambda do
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          1
          
          							post :create, :path => @attr

    159. 
          
          
          						end.should_not change(Path, :count)
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
          					end

    170. 
          
          
          					end
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          
          
          				end
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          
          
          			end
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
          			
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          1
          
          			describe "success" do
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          1
          
          				it "should create a path" do
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          1
          
          					lambda do
        
      177.

          1

          					end.should change(Path, :count).by(1)

      197.

      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          1
          
          		describe "PUT 'update'" do
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          1
          
          			before(:each) do
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          7
          
          				@attr = @attr.merge( :name => "New Path Name", :image_url => "http://changedimage.com" )
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          
          
          			end
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          
          
          				
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          1
          
          			describe "failure" do
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          1
          
          				describe "with empty values" do
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          1
          
          					before(:each) do
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          3
          
          						@attr = @attr.merge(:name => "", 
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          
          
          							:description => "",
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          
          
          							:image_url => "")
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          
          
          					end
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          
          
          				
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          1
          
          					it "should not create a path" do
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          1
          
          						lambda do
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          1
          
          							put :update, :id => @path, :path => @attr  
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          
          
          						end.should_not change(Path, :count)
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          
          
          					end
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          
          
          					
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          1
          
          					it "should send you back to the edit page" do

      220. 
      
        
    220. 
          
          
          					end
        
      221. 
      
        
    221. 
          
          
          					
        
      222.

          1
          
          					it "should have an error message" do
        
      223.

          1
          
          						put :update, :id => @path, :path => @attr
        
      224. 
      
        
    224. 
          1
          
          						response.should have_selector("div#error_explanation")
        
      225. 
      
        
    225. 
          
          
          					end
        
      226. 
      
        
    226. 
          
          
          				end
        
      227. 
      
        
    227. 
          
          
          			end
        
      228. 
      
        
    228. 
          
          
          			
        
      229. 
      
        
    229. 
          1
          
          			describe "success" do
        
      230. 
      
        
    230. 
          1
          
          				it "should change a path" do
        
      231. 
      
        
    231. 
          1
          
          					lambda do
        
      232. 
      
        
    232. 
          1
          
          						put :update, :id => @path, :path => @attr
        
      233. 
      
        
    233. 
          1
          
          						@path.reload
        
      234. 
      
        
    234. 
          
          
          					end.should change(@path, :name).to(@attr[:name])	
        
      235. 
      
        
    235. 
          
          
          				end
        
      236. 
      
        
    236. 
          
          
          				
        
      237. 
      
        
    237. 
          1
          
          				it "should redirect to the path page" do
        
      238. 
      
        
    238. 
          1
          
          					put :update, :id => @path, :path => @attr
        
      239. 
      
        
    239. 
          1
          
          					response.should redirect_to edit_path_path(@path)
        
      240. 
      
        
    240. 
          
          
          				end
        
      241. 
      
        
    241. 
          
          
          				
        
      242. 
      
        
    242. 
          1
          
          				it "should have a flash message" do
        
      243. 
      
        
    243. 
          1
          
          					put :update, :id => @path, :path => @attr
        
      244. 
      
        
    244. 
          1
          
          					flash[:success].should =~ /changes saved/i
        
      245. 
      
        
    245. 
          
          
          				end
        
      246. 
      
        
    246. 
          
          
          				
        
      247. 
      
        
    247. 
          1
          
          				it "should return profile pic set in image_url" do
        
      248. 
      
        
    248. 
          1
          
          					put :update, :id => @path, :path => @attr
        
      249. 
      
        
    249. 
          1
          
          					@path.reload
        
      250. 
      
        
    250. 
          1
          
          					@path.path_pic.should == @attr[:image_url]
        
      251. 
      
        
    251. 
          
          
          				end
        
      252. 
      
        
    252. 
          
          
          			end
        
      253. 
      
        
    253. 
          
          
          		end
        
      254. 
      
        
    254. 
          
          
          		
        
      255. 
      
        
    255. 
          1
          
          		describe "DELETE 'destroy'" do
        
      256. 
      
        
    256. 
          1
          
          			it "should destroy the path" do
        
      257. 
      
        
    257. 
          1
          
          				lambda do
        
      258. 
      
        
    258. 
          1
          
          					delete :destroy, :id => @path
        
      259. 
      
        
    259. 
          
          
          				end.should change(Path, :count).by(-1)
        
      260. 
      
        
    260. 
          
          
          			end
        
      261. 
      
        
    261. 
          
          
          		end
        
      262. 
      
        
    262. 
          
          
          		
        
      263. 
      
        
    263. 
          1
          
          		describe "GET 'show'" do
        
      264. 
      
        
    264. 
          1
          
                it "should not show any unpublished paths" do
        
      265. 
      
        
    265. 
          1
          
          				@user.set_company_admin(false)
        
      266. 
      
        
    266. 
          1
          
          				unpublished_path = Factory(:path, :company => @user.company, :user => @user, :is_published => false)
        
      267. 
      
        
    267. 
          1
          
          				get :show, :id => unpublished_path
        
      268. 
      
        
    268. 
          1
          
          				response.should redirect_to root_path
        
      269. 
      
        
    269. 
          
          
          			end
        
      270.

          1
          
          		describe "GET 'marketplace'" do
        
      495. 
      
        
    495. 
          1
          
          			before(:each) do
        
      496.

          				@purchaseable_paths = []

          8
          
          				3.times do
        
      498.

          24
          
          					@purchaseable_paths << Factory(:path, :company => @other_user.company, :user => @other_user)

          				end

          			end
        
      501.

          			end

          			describe "with search terms" do

          1
          
          				describe "that do not have results" do
        
      511. 
      
        
    511. 
          1
          
          					it "should be successful" do
        
      512. 
      
        
    512. 
          1
          
          						get :marketplace, :search => "ABCDEFGHIJK123"
        
      513. 
      
        
    513. 
          1

      325. 
      
        
    325. 
          1
          
          		describe "POST 'create'" do
        
      326. 
      
        
    326. 
          1
          
          			describe "failure" do
        
      327. 
      
        
    327. 
          1
          
          				before(:each) do
        
      328. 
      
        
    328. 
          3
          
          					@attr = { :name => "", :description => "", :image_url => "", :points => "", :company_id => @company.id }
        
      329. 
      
        
    329. 
          
          
          				end
        
      330. 
      
        
    330. 
          
          
          				
        
      331. 
      
        
    331.

    37. 
          1
          
          				response.should redirect_to signin_path

          			end

          		describe "POST 'create'" do
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          1
          
          			describe "failure" do
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          1
          
          				before(:each) do
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          2
          
          					@attr = @attr.merge(:name => "", :instructions => "", :position => "", :path_id => @path.id)
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
          				end
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
          			
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          1
          
          				it "should not create a section" do
        
      172.

          1
          
          					lambda do
        
      173.

          1
          
          						post :create, :section => @attr

          					end.should_not change(Section, :count)
        
      175.

          				end

      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          
          
          				end
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          
          
          			end
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          
          
          			
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          1
          
          			describe "success" do
        
      184.

          1

      185.

          1
          
          					lambda do

          					end.should change(Section, :count).by(1)

          				end

          1

          			end
        
      252. 
      
        
    252. 
          
          
          			
        
      253. 
      
        
    253. 
          1
          
          			describe "Success" do
        
      254. 
      
        
    254. 
          1
          
          				it "Should change section successfully" do
        
      255. 
      
        
    255. 
          1
          
          					put :update, :id => @section, :section => @attr
        
      256. 
      
        
    256. 
          1
          
          					@section.reload
        
      257. 
      
        
    257. 
          1
          
          					@section.name.should == @attr[:name]
        
      258. 
      
        
    258. 
          1
          
          					@section.instructions.should == @attr[:instructions]
        
      259. 
      
        
    259. 
          
          
          				end
        
      260. 
      
        
    260. 
          
          
          				
        
      261. 
      
        
    261. 
          1
          
          				it "Should redirect to section page" do

          					put :update, :id => @section, :section => @attr

    263. 
          1
          
          					response.should redirect_to edit_section_path(@section, :m => "instructions")
        
      264. 
      
        
    264. 
          
          
          				end
        
      265. 
      
        
    265. 
          
          
          				
        
      266.

          1
          
          				it "Should have a success message" do
        
      267.

          1
          
          					put :update, :id => @section, :section => @attr
        
      268. 
      
        
    268. 
          1
          
          					flash[:success].should =~ /updated/i
        
      269. 
      
        
    269. 
          
          
          				end
        
      270. 
      
        
    270. 
          
          
          			end
        
      271. 
      
        
    271. 
          
          
          		end
        
      272. 
      
        
    272. 
          
          
          		
        
      273. 
      
        
    273. 
          1
          
          		describe "DELETE 'destroy'" do
        
      274. 
      
        
    274. 
          1
          
          			it "should destroy the section" do
        
      275. 
      
        
    275. 
          1
          
          				lambda do
        
      276. 
      
        
    276. 
          1
          
          					delete :destroy, :id => @section
        
      277. 
      
        
    277. 
          
          
          				end.should change(Section, :count).by(-1)
        
      278. 
      
        
    278. 
          
          
          			end
        
      279. 
      
        
    279. 
          
          
          			
        
      280. 
      
        
    280. 
          1
          
          			it "should redirect to the section's path" do

          1
          
          				delete :destroy, :id => @section
        
      282. 
      
        
    282. 
          1
          
          				response.should redirect_to edit_path_path(@path, :m => "sections")
        
      283. 
      
        
    283. 
          
          
          			end
        
      284. 
      
        
    284. 
          
          
          		end
        
      285. 
      
        
    285. 
          
          
          		
        
      286. 
      
        
    286. 
          1
          
          		describe "GET 'continue'" do
        
      287.

          1
          
                it "should find the right section" do
        
      288. 
      
        
    288. 
          1
          
          				get :continue, :id => @section
        
      289. 
      
        
    289. 
          1
          
          				assigns(:section).should == @section
        
      290. 
      
        
    290. 
          
          
          			end

          				it "Should change user successfully" do

    spec/controllers/users_controller_spec.rb

          require 'spec_helper'

          1
          
          	render_views

          	before(:each) do

          	describe "POST 'create'" do
        
      24.

          1
          
          		before(:each) do
        
      25.

      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          1
          
          		describe "failure" do
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          1
          
          			describe "because of invalid company id" do
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          1
          
          				before(:each) do
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          3
          
          					@attr = @attr.merge(:company_id => "abc")
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
          				end
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
          				
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          1
          
          				it "should not be successful" do
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          1
          
          					post :create, :user => @attr
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          1
          
          					response.should_not be_success

          		it "should require a name" do
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          1
          
          			@company.users.build(@attr.merge(:name => "")).should_not be_valid
        
      21.

          		end
        
      22.

      23.

          		it "should reject names that are too long" do

      25.

          		end
        
      26.

          	end

      33.

          		it "should accept valid emails" do
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          1
          
          			emails = %w[user@example.com THE_USER@foo.bar.org first.last@foo.jp]
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          1

      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          3
          
          				user = @company.users.build(@attr.merge(:email => email))

    37. 
          3
          
          				user.should be_valid
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
          			end

      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          3

          1
          
          			lambda do

    123. 
          1
          
          				@user.toggle!(:admin)

          1
          
          				@user.reload

          1

          1
          
          			@user.toggle!(:admin)
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          1
          
          			@user.reload

          1
          
          			@user.salt.should == current_salt

          		end

      293.

          1

    297. 
          
          
          		end		
        
      298.

      299. 
      
        
    299. 
          1
          
          		describe "debit_points" do
        
      300. 
      
        
    300. 
          1
          
          			it "should add points to spent points" do
        
      301. 
      
        
    301. 
          1
          
          				current_points = @user.spent_points
        
      302. 
      
        
    302. 
          1
          
          				@user.debit_points(@reward.points)
        
      303. 
      
        
    303. 
          1
          
          				@user.spent_points.should > current_points
        
      304. 
      
        
    304. 
          1
          
          				@user.spent_points.should == current_points + @reward.points
        
      305. 
      
        
    305. 
          
          
          			end
        
      306. 
      
        
    306. 
          
          
          		end
        
      307. 
      
        
    307. 
          
          
          		
        
      308. 
      
        
    308. 
          1
          
          		describe "available_points" do
        
      309. 
      
        
    309. 
          1
          
          			it "should equal the earned points minus the spent points" do
        
      310. 
      
        
    310. 
          1
          
          				@user.earned_points = 100
        
      311. 
      
        
    311. 
          1
          
          				@user.spent_points = 25
        
      312. 
      
        
    312. 
          1
          
          				@user.available_points.should == 75
        
      313. 
      
        
    313. 
          
          
          			end
        
      314. 
      
        
    314. 
          
          
          		end
        
      315. 
      
        
    315. 
          
          
          	end
